greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: In prime factorization of n replace multiplication with bitwise logical 'and'.
comment: a(n) = a(A007947(n)); n is prime iff a(n)=n;
a(n)=0 iff n is even and one prime factor is of form 4*k+1.
link: Paul Tek, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 23 2002
